meanings.definition: The state or quality of being positive.
meanings.sent1: Her positiveness always brightened the room.
meanings.sent2: I appreciate the positiveness she brings to every situation.
meanings.sent3: His positiveness was so contagious that everyone started smiling.
meanings.sent4: The positiveness in her voice was like a ray of sunshine on a cloudy day.
meanings.sent5: The positiveness in the air was palpable, filling everyone with hope.

meanings.definition: The presence of something rather than its absence.
meanings.sent1: The positiveness of laughter filled the room.
meanings.sent2: I prefer the positiveness of love over the negativity of hate.
meanings.sent3: The positiveness of chocolate in the fridge always makes me happy.
meanings.sent4: The positiveness of her energy was like a magnet, drawing everyone towards her.
meanings.sent5: The positiveness of the flowers in the garden brought color and joy to the surroundings.
